name: v6.1.10
body:
iOS SDK - v6.1.1 + Strict mode version of ANE
Android SDK - v6.1.0

name: v6.0.30
body:
- iOS SDK v6.0.3

## What's new
- Updated SDK version
- Updated af_apk_fix.sh script to add `zipalign` required for apk upload to the store
- Renamed `waitForAdvertisingIdentifier` to `waitForATTUserAuthorization`

name: v5.4.1
body:
- AppsFlyer Android SDK v5.4.1
- AppsFlyer iOS SDK v5.4.1

## What's new
- Updated SDK version
- Added af_apk_fix.sh script to automate missing resource files in Android app built by ADT
- Added new API:
  - setSharingFilter(filters:Array):void
  - setSharingFilterForAllPartners():void
  - performOnAppAttribution(uri:String): void
  - setOneLinkCustomDomain(domains:Array):void
  - setCustomerUserId(appUserId:String):void (replaces deprecated setAppUserId)

name: v4.10.0
body:
- AppsFlyer Android SDK v4.10.0
- AppsFlyer iOS SDK v4.10.0

## What's new

- Reverted from broken version 5.1.0
- Aligned ActionScript  APIs mapping to native SDKs -> now single code works same way for both Android and iOS devices
- Google Play install referrer permission added to the resulting apk automatically after adding the extension
